text: I'm here with Super Mario run Nintendo's
first ever Super Mario iPhone game let's
start with the great stuff the first
most important thing about Super Mario
run you should know is that it is a good
Mario game
it's a gorgeous constant runner along
lines of Temple Run this was made by the
people who made the original Super Mario
games and the levels come across that
way they come across thoroughly designed
thought through smart after you've
completed one of the 24 levels in the
game you will then be encouraged to go
back and try to find all the secret
coins in that level and that's something
really amazing about this is that it
feels like a Mario game one of the worst
things about Super Mario run is maybe a
compliment in disguise there's kind of
not enough game here I blew through most
of Super Mario runs content in about two
hours that's not great right I think a
lot of folks are gonna get home and
they're gonna pay ten dollars for this
game and they're gonna be really excited
to play it and they're probably gonna
exhaust the content pretty quickly that
said there are two other modes there's a
kingdom builder mode it's kind of a a
world builder kind of concept and then
there's a code rally game mode which is
a race mode which is traditional Super
Mario but you are racing against other
peoples yes times and all that stuff is
fine but what you're really here for is
playing really good Super Mario levels
that's in the world tour mode and
there's not enough there unfortunately
so one other really great aspect of
Super Mario run is that it's gorgeous
and then tendo's hardware is not always
the most cutting edge however the iPhone
7 is super sharp for a 2d Mario this is
by far the best mario has ever looked so
one other major downside for Super Mario
run is that the game requires an
internet connection so for me I read the
New York City Subway all the time you
may not live in New York City that for
me is a huge problem because I can't
maintain a connection there but
commuters all over will assuredly find
frustration in this requiring an
internet connection as somebody who paid
$10 for the game it kind of stinks that
I can't just play it whenever I want
so that's Super Mario run it is really
gorgeous it's really fun somewhat
limited but you're probably going to
like Super Mario run and should check it
out if the $10 prices is too
for your blood there's a free version
you could try before buying it and you
can check it out right now on the iTunes
App Store and it's coming to android at
some point in the future so stay tuned
for that
